import sys
t = int(raw_input())
while t != 0:
    t -= 1
    n = int(raw_input())
    a = []
    b = [0]*n
    a = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    s = sum(a)
    ans = sys.maxsize
    for i in range(0, s+1):
        b[0] = i
        temp_sum = b[0]
        for j in range(1, n):
            b[j] = b[j-1] + 1
            temp_sum += b[j]
        if temp_sum == s:
            result = 0
            for j in range(0, n):
                if b[j] > a[j]:
                    result += (b[j] - a[j])
            ans = min(ans, result)
    if ans == sys.maxsize:
        print -1
    else:
        print ans
